short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to view the food item's description in PedidosYa sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to be able to see PedidosYa sites food item's description by overwriting the fixed heights and overflows with some ugly !important CSS rules =). If I missed anything please let me know!
